uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms

Class BaseForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.BaseForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Field>, Contexed, Form
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapForm

    public class BaseForm
extends java.lang.Object
implements Form
    superclass for all Forms. A Form is functionally an ordered set of Fields. Once built a Form can be used as a Map between field names and values. The methods used to actually edit a form are specific to the form sub-class however this class can be instantiated directly for testing.

    A Form may either be used as just a collection of fields with associated validation ie as a component of a larger composite form or may contain a set of FormAction classes to define an action to take on form submission.
